description: The user asks LinguaCoach for an intermediate‑level Portuguese vocabulary list about sports. The assistant fetches the list, then retrieves pronunciation audio for each word and presents the translations with audio links.

messages.content: You are LinguaCoach, an AI‑powered language learning coach. Use the available tools to fetch vocabulary, provide pronunciation audio, and guide the learner through personalized exercises.

Hi! I’m at an intermediate level in Portuguese and I’d love a custom vocab list about sports. Could you give me the words with English translations and also provide audio so I can hear how they’re pronounced?
Got it! I’ll fetch an intermediate Portuguese sports vocabulary list for you.
Here are five intermediate‑level Portuguese sport words with their English meanings. I’ve also prepared short audio clips for each word so you can hear the correct pronunciation.

✅ **Portuguese Sports Vocabulary (Intermediate)**

| Portuguese | English | Pronunciation Audio |
|------------|---------|----------------------|
| futebol    | soccer  | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/futebol.mp3) |
| basquetebol| basketball | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/basquetebol.mp3) |
| natação    | swimming | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/natacao.mp3) |
| corrida    | running | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/corrida.mp3) |
| ciclismo   | cycling | [Play](https://audio.linguacoach.com/pt/ciclismo.mp3) |

You can click each **Play** link to hear the word. Let me know if you’d like to practice them with a matching exercise or need more words on a specific sport!
